```
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at x=-13.0 y=-50.0
Consists of a furnace at position (-13.0, -50.0) and a burner inserter at position (-12.5, -51.5)

ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using get_entity on a non-existent entity
-  Ensure that the entity exists at the specified position before calling get_entity. Double-check the position and the prototype of the entity.

### Errors when inserting items into a full inventory
-  Before inserting items, check the target entity's inventory capacity and current item count to ensure there is enough space.

### Errors when placing an entity without having it in inventory
- Before placing an entity, check if the entity is in the agent's inventory

NAMESPACE
```
